snippet: E.P.A. and contractor crews accidentally unleashed lead and arsenic from a Colorado mine into the Animas River.
abstract: Environmental officials are working to clean up gallons of wastewater containing heavy metals that spilled into Colorado's Animas River while Environmental protection agency was investigating leak at Gold King Mine.
lead_paragraph: E.P.A. and contractor crews accidentally unleashed lead and arsenic from a Colorado mine into the Animas River.

headline.main: Colorado: Heavy Metals Spill Into River
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Heavy Metals Spill Into River
